purpose.summary: CICS COBOL program that presents a main menu screen to regular users in the CardDemo application, receives user option selection via ENTER key, validates the option based on user type and availability, and transfers control to the selected program using XCTL. Handles PF3 to return to signon screen and invalid inputs with error messages.
purpose.business_context: CardDemo application main menu for regular users after signon

inputs.name: COMEN1AI
inputs.description: Menu screen input map containing user-selected option in OPTIONI field

inputs.name: DFHCOMMAREA
inputs.description: Program communication area passed from caller, moved to CARDDEMO-COMMAREA containing user context and menu data

inputs.name: EIBAID
inputs.description: CICS attention key identifier (e.g., DFHENTER, DFHPF3) to determine user action

outputs.name: COMEN1AO
outputs.description: Menu screen output map populated with header info, menu options, error messages, and selected option echo

outputs.name: CARDDEMO-COMMAREA
outputs.description: Updated communication area with from-program, from-tranid, context, and user data for XCTL or RETURN
